definition: A term commonly employed to describe a two-dimensional geometric entity that lacks depth, typically used to quantify the extent or size of a surface. It is frequently utilized in various fields such as mathematics, architecture, and geography to measure the area of an object or a region.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Raumes beträgt 50 Quadratmeter.
examples.english: The area of the room is 50 square meters.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Sees beträgt 100 Hektar.
examples.english: The area of the lake is 100 hectares.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Grundstücks ist sehr groß.
examples.english: The area of the plot is very large.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Landes ist von Wäldern bedeckt.
examples.english: The area of the country is covered with forests.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Parks ist für alle Besucher zugänglich.
examples.english: The area of the park is accessible to all visitors.
